item.title: CASIO introduces the G-SHOCK x ITZY SS2024 collection in Singapore
item.description: CASIO is promoting their new G-SHOCK shock-resistant watches for spring 2024 with the help of K-pop group ITZY, who have been G-SHOCK brand ambassadors since February 2023. ITZY is shown wearing the new GMA-P2100SG-1A, GMA-P2100SG-4A, GMA-S120VA-7A, and GMA-S140VA-7A watches in a promotional image. Ryujin and Chaeryeong showcase the GMA-P2100SG-1A and GMA-P2100SG-4A, which are inspired by sunset hues on a beach. These watches are based on the GMA-P2100, a smaller version of the well-liked GMA-S2100 analog-digital combination watch.

item.title: Verizon Goes After Blue Collar Cell Phones
item.description: When picturing someone in a hard hat using a cell phone, most people think of a Nextel phone, known for their walkie-talkie feature and durability. However, Verizon is now entering this market, aiming to capture the construction and outdoor enthusiast demographics. Verizon has the advantage of being a larger company with a wider customer base and a broader phone selection. They have leveled the playing field by adding push-to-talk (PTT) functionality and introducing tougher phones.
